request.description: Get general information about all available markets.

response.name: Markets

request.description: Return details about a specific market including info about fees, user permissions/market state and the most recent 200 trades.

Get ticker values for all markets.
Get ticker values for the given market. The `market_id` value should be a valid market integer ID. These IDs are returned on the `Markets` and `Market Details` endpoints

request.description: Get orderbook values for the given market. The `market_id` value should be a valid market integer ID. These IDs are returned on the `Markets` and `Market Details` endpoints

variable.description: OHLCV data is chunked by this interval

request.description:
Returns OHLCV data for a specific market. Accepts an interval value which returns OHLCV data in chunks of the specified interval duration. 

Valid interval values include:

Intervals | Meaning
---------- | -------
fivemin | Five minute slices
fifteenmin | Fifteen minute slices
thirtymin | Thirty minute slices
onehour | One hour slices 
twohour | Two hour slices
fourhour | Four hour slices 
oneday | One day slices

request.description:
Returns the currently available `base_currency` and `markey_currency`  balances for a user on the given market. These amounts do **not** include amounts currently represented in open orders, pending deposits or withdraws.

Also returns lists of `open_orders` and `closed_orders`

query.description: Expects an order ID and returns orders with and ID < the passed ID

request.description:
Fetches the last 200 orders made by your account with all the trades associated.

If you need more than the last 200 trades use the `older_than` param. Passing an order ID will return results only orders which are older than that order ID.

Returns a list of the user's Withdraws and metadata including `id`, `amount`, `currency`, `address`, `status`, `network_data`, `created_at` values
Takes an Withdraw ID and returns data about that Withdraw
Returns a list of the user's Deposits and metadata including `id`, `amount`, `currency`, `address`, `status`, `network_data`, `created_at` values.

Returns a list of the user's Transfers and metadata. Transfers are a special internal movement of funds between qTrade users. User created Transfers are not currently supported

query.description: Price in base currency of the market

request.description: Creates a request with Withdraw currency to a specified address. Currency is removed from the balance upon success, the corresponding network transaction may be delayed for up to 5 minutes.

response.name: Create a Withdraw

request.description:
Returns a deposit address for sending money to your exchange account. This address should rarely change, but it is good practice to fetch it before sending currency every time.

The returned `currency_status` key may be one of 4 values:

Status | Returns address | Use case
--- | --- | --- 
`ok` | Yes | Normal operation
`degraded` | Yes | Down for maintenance. Funds will be credited once maintenance is completed
`disabled` | No | Deposits temporarily disabled due to network issues. Typically due to excessive forking, stalled chain, or consesus issues
`offline` | No | Offline for other reason
`delisted` | No | Currency is delisted and deposits are no longer accepted
